description:
There are many great racing games available for Xbox, so it ultimately depends on what type of racing game you enjoy and what features you're looking for. Here are some of the best Xbox racing games in no particular order:

1. Forza Horizon 4 - This open-world racing game is set in the UK and features a wide variety of cars, customizable races, and stunning graphics.

2. Dirt 5 - This off-road racing game features a range of vehicles, including rally cars, trucks, and buggies, and offers multiple game modes, including a career mode and online multiplayer.

3. F1 2021 - This Formula One racing game allows you to create your own F1 team, compete in races, and manage your team's finances and strategy.

4. Project Cars 3 - This racing game features an extensive car list, dynamic weather and time of day, and a career mode where you can progress through different racing disciplines.

5. WRC 9 - This rally racing game features licensed cars and tracks from the World Rally Championship, as well as a career mode and online multiplayer.
name: xbox racing games
